thread.title: Trump repaid Cohen for 'third party' expense: disclosure

title: Trump repaid Cohen for 'third party' expense: disclosure
text:
Trump repaid Cohen for 'third party' expense: disclosure Thursday, May 17, 2018 - 01:20
U.S. President Donald Trump repaid his attorney Michael Cohen for an expense greater than $100,001 and less than $250,000 that was incurred in 2016, according to ethics disclosures signed by the president that were released by the Office of Government Ethics on Wednesday. Zachary Goelman reports.
